title: Annie's passive
body:
Recently i played Fizz against Annie and i was annoyed by her passive+q and fizz e interaction because after i dodged q her passive was still up.
You can ask yourself "Why this is bad, Fizz has already over 50% ban rate ?".
So i think this is bad because Annie's W and R are instant-cast and dodging q is only way i can trade without her stun.
I think that it hurts counter-play, because it's really satisfying when you bait her to use q+passive and then you cancel both of them.
It would be really nice if it's fixed.

replies.body: You could always buy hourglass if using E bothers you that badly.

Not really. Since in the code the skill needs to be landed to stun. It isn't consumed on used. That's why you can QW with 3 stacks and make the Q stuns if you're W didn't hit anything. 
So my best advice is: Deal with it.
